mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food (name, price, `desc`, food_img, weight, make_time, publish_status, recommend_status, new_status) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{desc}, #{food_img}, #{weight}, #{make_time}, #{publish_status}, #{recommend_status}, #{new_status});
mapper.update: UPDATE food SET name= #{name}, price = #{price}, 'desc' = #{desc}, food_img=#{food_img}, publish_status=#{publish_status}, recommend_status=#{recommend_status}, new_status=#{new_status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT food.*, classification.class_name FROM food, classification, food_class WHERE food.id = food_class.food_id AND food_class.classification_id = classification.id
SELECT food.*, classification.class_name FROM food, classification, food_class WHERE food.id = food_class.food_id AND food_class.classification_id = classification.id AND classification_id = #{value}
